system.description:
While Exhausted, you feel fatigued and everything increases in difficulty.

When you gain this condition, it states a negative number in parentheses; each time you make a test, apply a penalty equal to this number. When you finish a long rest, reduce your Exhausted penalty by 1.

Unlike most conditions, Exhausted has a cumulative effect. When you gain a second instance of this condition, add its listed penalty to your current Exhausted penalty.

For example, if an effect makes you Exhausted (−2), you subtract 2 from all tests; if a different effect then makes you Exhausted (−1), that increases your Exhausted penalty, so you now subtract 3 from all tests.
